about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Ahmedabad-based Osia Hypermart Retail Limited is an emerging retail supermarket chain. It focuses on value retailing by offering products at competitive pricing. Currently, the brand has 11 distribution stores across five cities (Ahmedabad, Vadodara, Dehgam, Gandhinagar and Gandhidham) in Gujarat.

Each Osia shopping store is segregated into different segment such as crockery, Handbags, Women's wear, Cosmetics, Footwear, Menswear, handlooms, etc.

It has more than thousands of products focused on fulfilling every need of a family. The Osia is a distributor which sources the products from Calcutta, Mumbai, Delhi, Surat, Agra, Ahmedabad and Tripura.

The company is planning to expand the business with comparative arrangement stores which can provide products maintaining a balance between cost and quality. The company is also looking forward to trade wholesale which will boost the growth of the company.

The competitive strengths of the company are:

• A range of products
• Good brand reputation in Gujarat
• 11 distribution stores in Gujarat
• Products for lower to upper-class consumers

faqs.question: What is the Osia Hyper IPO?
faqs.answer:
Osia Hyper IPO is a SME IPO of 1578400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹39.78 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹252 per share. The minimum order quantity is 400.

The IPO opens on March 26, 2019, and closes on March 28, 2019.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Osia Hyper IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Osia Hyper IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Osia Hyper IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Osia Hyper IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Osia Hyper IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Osia Hyper IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Osia Hyper IPO opens on March 26, 2019 and closes on March 28, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Osia Hyper IPO?
faqs.answer: Osia Hyper IPO lot size is 400, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,00,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Osia Hyper IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Osia Hyper IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Osia Hyper IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Osia Hyper IPO will be done on Tuesday, April 2, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, April 4, 2019. Check the Osia Hyper IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Osia Hyper IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Osia Hyper IPO listing date is on Friday, April 5, 2019.
